name: Cube Loop (iiPaKzeK)
description:
GAME DESCRIPTION:

The game is about a cube that can jump on walls and has a pistol to shoot enemies, but every level is the same level with a slight change.

every new level is a new challenge and a new thing to discover.

DEV NOTES:

I just made this game as a fun and educational experience :)

so it's gonna be buggy and very low quality but I did my best to fix as many bugs as I could to keep it playable and fun.

IN-GAME NOTES:

the game felt really well for speedrunning, so I added a timer that can be activated and deactivated in the settings.

IN-GAME NOTES(bugs):

it's very recommended to have fullscreen mode on, because of a bug that reset the resolution to its default between each level.

resolution option doesn't work in the main menu screen.

(SPOILERS!!)gaining the shotgun after level 10 will stay with you in all the other levels(including main menu and tutorial), to reset the shotgun stat you have to close and open the game.
